'''Caras Galadhon''' is the thirty-second scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and the thirty-eighth of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
